stake(uint256).details: Creating staking pool if doesn't exist effectively locks direct call.

params.amount: Number of GRG units with undelegate.
Number of GRG units to unstake.

devdoc.title: Self Custody adapter - A helper contract for self custody.

stake(uint256).notice: Stakes an amount of GRG to own staking pool. Creates staking pool if doesn't exist.

unstake(uint256).notice: Unstakes staked undelegated tokens for the pool.

withdrawDelegatorRewards().notice: Withdraws delegator rewards of the pool.
